input.sentences: our trip to location was spectacular .
the masquerade was happening all around us .
this old church was by far our favorite attraction .
output.sentences: My first trip to Europe;and it's everything and more;look at how people travel to and fro on the cananl,like we do on the highways back home.
One of the Spring events is the masquerade parade.
And ofcourse we can't miss the jugglers,and hope they don't fall flat.
This was the last of the church tour and the most beautiful of all.
